Item.Title: Gokulashtami
Item.Details: Lokmanya Mandal is organising Gokulashtami on Sunday 12th August for everybody's convinience and maximum participation.
Item.content: Lokmanya Mandal had organised Gokulashtami on Sunday 12th August 2012. The reponse for average as always, but everybody turned out to feast on "Dahikala".

Item.Title: Independence Day Celebrations
Item.Details: As usual Independence Day will be celebrated with a flag hoisting ceremony followed by coffee and snacks

Item.Title: I building Lift
Item.Details: Much awaited I building lift is ready and awaiting its inaugration

Item.Title: New Managing Committe
Item.Details: New Managing Committe has been elected with some fresh faces and ideas
